people.name: Talha Barkin
people.description: Executive Chef Talha Barkin’s philosophy has roots in the environment he grew up in – Koycegiz, Mugla, a lakeside town in Mediterranean Turkey where his mother’s and grandmother’s cooking, combined with abundant, soulful ingredients, inspired his palate. As a young chef, he gained exposure to world cuisine through worldwide assignments, and now with a more than 20-year career, he has received numerous medals in prestigious culinary competitions in Dubai. When asked what attracted him to working in Hampshire, he said it was the beauty and history of the property. “My arrival at Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire was very special. To see the manor house through the rolling hills on first approach was something everyone should experience.” Bringing valued experience and an abundance of energy, Chef Barkin creates memorable dishes for hotel guests. Seeking the finest locally sourced produce, he blends flavours from his journeys and adds his own twist to his dishes. He believes that a passion for the craft equates to the love poured into a dish, and that’s the most important ingredient of all.
people.title: Executive Chef

requestForm.confirmationMessage: Thank you. We will contact you to confirm your reservation.
requestForm.name: Wild Carrot

restaurants.overview: Discover Wild Carrot, a culinary jewel at Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire, where local sustainable ingredients celebrate British cuisine. Executive Chef Talha Barkin crafts a seasonal menu, from classic English breakfasts to innovative dinners. Every bite is a tribute to countryside flavours – a gastronomic journey through Britain’s rich culinary heritage.
restaurants.name: Wild Carrot

restaurants.overview: Dive into the flavours of Southeast Asia with our new nutrition-focused menu at Café Sante. Enjoy the vibrant, fresh taste of our colourful poke bowls and the tang of our Vietnamese rolls. It’s a light and lively culinary journey, mixing bright favourites with a healthy, exciting twist.
restaurants.name: Café Santé

restaurants.overview: Discover a fusion of tradition and innovation with our bar’s craft cocktails and artisanal concoctions. Inspired by Hampshire’s seasonal bounty, each drink is a unique celebration of local flavours. From classic favourites to creative mixes, our menu offers a charming and genuine taste of the countryside’s best.
restaurants.name: The Bar at Wild Carrot

restaurants.overview: Indulge in The Drawing Room’s quintessential British afternoon tea, where seasonal sweet and savoury delights meet bespoke teas. Add sparkle to your experience with chilled champagnes and local English sparkling wines, all set in an ambience that’s both charming and refined. The perfect blend of tradition and elegance awaits.

restaurants.overview: Relish the winter charm of Off Piste. Located in our historic spa courtyard, this enchanting tepee restaurant offers a unique blend of Swiss-inspired dishes and fine wines. Amid rustic oak tables and a bark bar, enjoy our delightful cuisine, from light lunches to truffle-laced cheese fondue.

Enter a world of festive magic with our Christmas Shop. Treat yourself and your loved ones to one of our grand festive hampers, or discover bespoke luxury treats inspired by the local countryside. Stop in to shop or contact us to arrange a delivery.

Open to all guests and visitors.

treatments.description: This therapeutic massage helps stabilize, heal and renew the body with long light-to-medium pressured strokes. Drift off blissfully surrounded by the notes of your chosen oils and wake up feeling balanced.
treatments.name: Inner Peace
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: Ideal for emotionally exhausted souls, this focused, back-only experience has a soothing and restorative effect on the sympathetic and parasympathetic nervous systems.
treatments.name: Kundalini Healing
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: Meaning “beautiful, shining jewel” in Sanskrit, the Manipura massage uses marma massage, lymph flow stimulation and herb poultices to relieve digestive blockages and increase blood flow.
treatments.name: Manipura
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: Advanced full body massage that works on the five elements. Powerful Tibetan techniques such as hand cupping, warm poultices and accupressure are used to stimulate and release physical and mental tension.
treatments.name: Ku Nye Massage
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: A deep, firm, effective full-body massage coupled with rhythmic, hypnotic pressure points to release deeply held patterns of tension.
treatments.name: Deep Tissue
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: Warm healing basalt stones are placed onto pressure points to balance the body and mind. The heated stones, with muscle-soothing oils, are massaged in slow and fluid movements to stimulate circulation and ease the body into a state of relaxation.
treatments.name: Hot Stones
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: This massage uses ancient teachings passed down through generations of our Balinese lead therapist. Experience this journey that begins with a guided inhalation of oils and flowers picked from our Estate before you emerge into a synchronized dance of massage and full-body stretches.
treatments.name: Ni Putu Signature Massage
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: Specially designed for expectant mothers from their second trimester, 13 weeks and post labour. This light pampering massage treatment targets lower back, legs and feet.
treatments.name: Dreamy Pregnancy Massage
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: This salt crystal scrub has the immediate effect of restoring vitality and energy levels, mental clarity, well-being and strength. The ensuing amethyst gel body wrap relaxes and balances the nervous system, stimulating circulation, and promotes regeneration of skin cells and cell growth.
treatments.name: Pearl and Jasmine Scrub and Wrap
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: An energizing and detoxifying scrub is intensified by the addition of a mud wrap, drawing deeper toxins from the cells. Awakening the skin and lymphatic system, this wrap detoxifies and cleanses the body, removing waste products, and re-energizing and softening the skin.
treatments.name: Bio-Energizing Scrub and Wrap
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: A high-performance facial to deeply nourish and hydrate. Suitable for all skin types, it’s formulation is especially effective to calm and soothe damaged, inflamed and irritated skin.
treatments.name: The Signature Harley Street Facial
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: The SturmGlow awakens the skin by incorporating techniques created in their clinic for cleansing, exfoliating, potent hydration and firming massage, with cutting-edge molecular efficacy to reduce fine lines. Light-reflecting pigments in GLOW DROPS leave the skin with a visible, youthful radiance.
treatments.name: The Sturmglow Facial by Dr Barbara Sturm
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: Customized to the needs and challenges of men’s skin, this treatment cleanses, tones, soothes and comforts irritated skin. The Men’s Facial removes rough or dry skin, improves skin barrier function and refines pores, while also fighting the signs of ageing, under-eye discoloration and puffiness.
treatments.name: Men’s Facial by Dr Barbara Sturm
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: The most opulent anti-ageing facial with a unique facial peel ensures the skin is fresh and firm by sculpting along natural contours of the face for a truly lifted and youthful appearance.
treatments.name: Black Diamond Non-Surgical Lift Facial
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

treatments.description: The ultimate event-ready facial gives maximum glow and luminosity with a three-level approach to facial massage and the use of a wrinkle- minimizing wand.
treatments.name: Rose Gold Radiance Facial
treatments.footnote: Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice. Prices are subject to a 10% discretionary service charge on all treatments and spa days. This charge is intended to cover a portion of costs associated with our employees.

people.name: Sharkie’s Reef
people.description: Have a splash at our fun-packed family adventure pool, complete with a four-metre slide, rotating umbrella fountain and bubble jets.

people.name: Horseback Riding
people.description: Bring the family to the Equestrian Centre for an unrivalled equine experience for all ages and abilities. Let the kids go for a countryside canter or a gentle hack around the Dogmersfield Park Estate, or simply enjoy some grooming time with our resident Shetlands, Dougal and Milo.

people.name: Falconry
people.description: Under expert tuition, discover the fundamentals of falconry with an introduction to birds, including eagles, hawks, falcons and owls.

people.name: Pony Grooming
people.description: Spend quality time with our resident miniature Shetland ponies Milo and Dougal. Discover how they like to be groomed and brushed while feeding them some of their favourite snacks.

people.name: Picnics on the Estate
people.description: Enjoy time together and indulge in a family-style picnic anywhere on our Estate. Pick your spot and leave the rest to us.

people.name: Discover Our Playground
people.description: Located close to our Spa, our playground is sure to be a hit with the kids with its multiple slides and things to climb.

modules.title: On-Site Activities
items: Fly Fishing (Kids must be ages 8 or over)
Clay pigeon shooting  (Kids must be ages 10 or over)

modules.title: Complimentary Family Amenities
items: Children under age 5 eat free at Wild Carrot

entries.name: Kids
entries.overview: Located just one hour from London on Dogmersfield Park Estate, Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire is not only steeped with over 1,000 years of history but also boasts activities and facilities sure to keep all members of the family happy, whatever their disposition.

rows:
Daily
6:30 AM - 10:00 PM
Monday - Friday
Family Time 4:00 pm – 7:00 pm
Saturday,Sunday
Family Time 8:00 am – 10:00 am & 4:00 pm – 7:00 pm

entries.name: Main Pool
entries.overview: Natural light and calming waters invite you into our infinity pool. Refresh with a swim inside, or slip into the connected outdoor vitality pool, complete with water-massage features and surrounded by a sun terrace, loungers and umbrellas.

entries.name: Family Pool
entries.overview: For younger guests, and those just young at heart, the Sharkie’s Reef family adventure pool features designs by a renowned entertainment industry sculptor.

modules.title: Other Fitness Services and Amenities
items: Certified trainers (fee applies for personal training)

entries.name: Fitness Facilities
entries.overview: French doors that open onto the greenery of the Spa garden and the spacious Zen studio are just a couple of the reasons to visit the Fitness Centre during your stay. This thoughtfully designed space invites you to get your heart rate up with state-of-the-art equipment, discover a new passion in one of our fitness classes, or cool down in the mist of the lifestyle shower. For a uniquely Hampshire, exercise experience, take one of our mountain bikes and explore the 500-acre estate, or cycle into the local village.

modules.title: Available Items
items: Power Strips with Standard USB Chargers

entries.name: Work at Leisure
entries.overview: Step into a new era of travel, with premium offerings to ensure a seamless transition between leisure and business. Our dedicated team is available to provide you with contemporary amenities for your preferred working environment. Chat with us to request any of the items below.

featuredGallery.description: Our historic manor, surrounded by the rolling English countryside
A seamless blend of English country living with 21st-century modernity
Find beautiful English country stylings everywhere you look
Welcoming all guests to our Hampshire Estate
Views of the English countryside complement a variety of dining options
Designed with work and relaxation in mind, the Oliver King Parlour Suite reflects the beauty of the Estate’s grounds
Savour true English tradition with afternoon tea in The Drawing Room
Make a splash in our family pool, Sharkie’s Reef
Sip on a craft cocktail while you’re surrounded by traditional English comfort and modern design
Floor-to-ceiling windows and skylights bathe the infinity pool in soothing natural light
Fun for the whole family with clubs and children’s facilities
A setting that’s filled with inviting English history
Feathered friends are sure to leave you on a high
The Dogmersfield Park Estate offers a remarkable equine experience for riders of all abilities
Take your pick of country pursuits with trained professionals
Meet our infamous resident ponies – Milo and Dougal
Personalized experiences you’ll treasure for a lifetime

textContent.description: Experience the city and the countryside with a combined stay at two Four Seasons UK destinations.

inclusions.title: Included
items: Two nights at Four Seasons Hotel London at Park Lane and two nights at Four Seasons Hotel Hampshire

textContent.advanceDays: Reservation must be made at least 3 days in advance.

textContent.decor: A variety of colour schemes, with furnishings and prints reflecting the Hotel’s country setting.
textContent.uniqueFeatures: Historic views of the stable block, Option for an interconnecting room
textContent.description: Located in the South Wing, these rooms overlook our historic, 18th-century stable block. Enjoy spacious and well-defined seating and work areas, colourful décor and a marble bathroom.

textContent.occupancy: 3 adults, or 2 adults and 1 child (Sofabed is suitable for two children ages 10 and under. Please contact the Hotel.)
textContent.decor: A variety of colour schemes, with furnishings and prints reflecting the Hotel’s country setting.
textContent.uniqueFeatures: Soothing design and a private, refrigerated bar, Option for an interconnecting room, Make-up table and desk, Two LG Ultra Oled Wallpaper Thin TVs
textContent.description: Our Executive Suites are a family favourite, with spacious sitting rooms inviting you to relax and spend time together. Families can also comfortably settle in with an extra bed for children, which can be arranged.

textContent.occupancy: 3 adults, or 2 adults and 1 child, Sofabed is suitable for two children ages 10 and under. Please contact the Hotel.
textContent.decor: A variety of colour schemes, with furnishings and prints reflecting the Hotel’s country setting.
textContent.uniqueFeatures: Located on the first floor of the original 18th century Manor, Separate lounge area with traditional English furnishings, Claw-foot, free-standing tub in bathroom, Working desk, Two LG Ultra Oled Wallpaper Thin TVs
textContent.description: For your most romantic getaway, escape to the Oliver King Parlour Suite. This sanctuary offers everything you’ll adore from a historic manor house stay and more.

featured.name: Afternoon Tea
featured.description: Enjoy quintessentially British afternoon tea at the Drawing Room, our Hotel's grand yet homelike lounge. Seasonal cakes and pastries are served, along with a selection of traditional finger sandwiches and freshly baked scones.

products.name: Cocktail Making Class
products.description: Create your own signature cocktail with the help of your personal bartending guru, topping it off with a flamboyant or classy garnish and presentation for a memorable Hampshire picture. Finish your session by enjoying your creations paired with a light bite of your choice.

products.name: Thanksgiving Dinner

Indulge in an array of traditional holiday favourites such as roast turkey with all the trimmings and desserts that capture the warmth and joy of the season. With its cozy ambiance, exceptional service and seasonal delights, Wild Carrot is the perfect setting for an unforgettable celebration.

Accompany a Harris hawk around the Four Seasons estate, learning all about this majestic creature, as well as how to fly it and coax it down from the trees.
